nodes.text: Ben Acker is an author. Along with Ben Blacker, Acker is writing the books in the Star Wars: Join the Resistance series of young readers focusing on a group of young Resistance members in the years after Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. Acker also created with Blacker the program Thrilling Adventure Hour.
Acker along with Blacker contributed to the compilation volume From a Certain Point of View.
